Operation 'Preprocessing_GetPageAngle' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary uses slashes which is unclear for AI agents. Description lacks output details (what format/units the angle is returned in) and doesn't explain the practical use case. Enhanced version specifies return format and downstream applications for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Get the angle of the page / document / receipt
data.current_description: Analyzes a photo or image of a document and identifies the rotation angle of the page.
data.summary_suggestion: Detect and return document page rotation angle
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a photo or image of a document to identify the rotation angle of the page. Returns the detected angle in degrees, which can be used to correct document skew or rotation. Useful for preprocessing documents before OCR operations.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses slashes which is unclear for AI agents. Description lacks output details (what format/units the angle is returned in) and doesn't explain the practical use case. Enhanced version specifies return format and downstream applications for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'Receipts_PhotoToCSV' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is too long and repetitive. Description lacks specificity about what data is extracted and the output format details. Enhanced version specifies extracted fields, clarifies the output format, and provides context for when AI agents should use this operation. Terminology is now more consistent with the ReceiptRecognitionResult schema in the API context.

data.current_summary: Convert a photo of a receipt into a CSV file containing structured information from the receipt
data.current_description: Leverage Deep Learning to automatically turn a photo of a receipt into a CSV file containing the structured information from the receipt.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract receipt data and convert to CSV format
data.description_suggestion: Uses Deep Learning to automatically extract structured information from a receipt photo and convert it to CSV format. Extracts key receipt fields such as items, quantities, prices, totals, and merchant information. Returns a CSV file with the recognized receipt data. Useful for expense tracking and receipt processing workflows.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too long and repetitive. Description lacks specificity about what data is extracted and the output format details. Enhanced version specifies extracted fields, clarifies the output format, and provides context for when AI agents should use this operation. Terminology is now more consistent with the ReceiptRecognitionResult schema in the API context.

message: Operation 'ImageOcr_ImageLinesWithLocation' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Summary incorrectly states 'words' when the operation extracts 'lines'. The description is comprehensive and includes appropriate context about use cases, format support, and authentication requirements. The summary needs correction to accurately reflect that this operation returns lines, not words, for better AI agent routing.

data.current_summary: Convert a scanned image into words with location
data.current_description: Converts an uploaded image in common formats such as JPEG, PNG into lines/text with location information and other metdata via Optical Character Recognition.  This API is intended to be run on scanned documents.  If you want to OCR photos (e.g. taken with a smart phone camera), be sure to use the photo/toText API instead, as it is designed to unskew the image first.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract text lines with location from scanned image
data.reasoning: Summary incorrectly states 'words' when the operation extracts 'lines'. The description is comprehensive and includes appropriate context about use cases, format support, and authentication requirements. The summary needs correction to accurately reflect that this operation returns lines, not words, for better AI agent routing.

message: Operation 'PdfOcr_GetAsyncJobStatus' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Missing description entirely. Summary is overly detailed for a summary and reads more like a description. The description needs to explain the polling pattern, what parameters are required (job ID), what states are possible, and when results become available. This context is essential for AI agents to understand the async workflow.

data.current_summary: Returns the result of the Async Job - possible states can be STARTED or COMPLETED
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve asynchronous OCR job status and results
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the status and results of an asynchronous OCR processing job. Returns job state (STARTED or COMPLETED) and the OCR result when processing is complete. Use this operation to poll for completion of long-running PDF or image OCR operations. Requires the job ID returned from the initial OCR request.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Summary is overly detailed for a summary and reads more like a description. The description needs to explain the polling pattern, what parameters are required (job ID), what states are possible, and when results become available. This context is essential for AI agents to understand the async workflow.

data.current_summary: Converts an uploaded PDF file into text via Optical Character Recognition.
data.description_suggestion: Converts an uploaded PDF file into text via Optical Character Recognition. Supports common PDF formats and is optimized for scanned documents. Returns the extracted text with confidence ratings. For free tier API keys, a credit card is required for security purposes. If you need location information for extracted text, use the pdf/to/lines-with-location or pdf/to/words-with-location APIs instead.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. message: Operation 'ImageOcr_PhotoRecognizeBusinessCard' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description lacks clarity about the response format (BusinessCardRecognitionResult schema) and authentication requirements. Added explicit mention of the response schema type and authentication requirement to improve AI agent interpretability. The credit card requirement is a side effect that should be more prominently positioned.

data.current_summary: Recognize a photo of a business card, extract key business information
data.current_description: Analyzes a photograph of a business card as input, and outputs key business information such as the name of the person, name of the business, the address of the business, the phone number, the email address and more.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a photograph of a business card and extracts key business information including person name, business name, address, phone number, email address, and other contact details. Returns a BusinessCardRecognitionResult object containing the extracted fields. Requires authentication via API key. Note: Free tier API keys require a credit card on file for security purposes to use this operation.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks clarity about the response format (BusinessCardRecognitionResult schema) and authentication requirements. Added explicit mention of the response schema type and authentication requirement to improve AI agent interpretability. The credit card requirement is a side effect that should be more prominently positioned.

message: Operation 'ImageOcr_PhotoRecognizeForm' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology. Original description has typo ('Customzie'), lacks clarity about input parameters (field definitions), and doesn't specify the response schema. Improved summary to be more action-oriented and specific about customization. Enhanced description to clarify that field definitions are provided as input, specify the response schema type, and correct terminology for consistency with API context.

data.current_summary: Recognize a photo of a form, extract key fields and business information
data.current_description: Analyzes a photograph of a form as input, and outputs key business fields and information.  Customzie data to be extracted by defining fields for the form.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract form fields from a photo using custom field definitions
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a photograph of a form and extracts key fields and business information based on custom field definitions provided in the request. Accepts form field definitions to customize which data is extracted from the form. Returns a FormRecognitionResult object containing the extracted field values and confidence ratings. Requires authentication via API key. Note: Free tier API keys require a credit card on file for security purposes to use this operation.
data.reasoning: Original description has typo ('Customzie'), lacks clarity about input parameters (field definitions), and doesn't specify the response schema. Improved summary to be more action-oriented and specific about customization. Enhanced description to clarify that field definitions are provided as input, specify the response schema type, and correct terminology for consistency with API context.

message: Operation 'ImageOcr_PhotoRecognizeFormAdvanced' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology. Original description has typo ('Customzie'), conflates inline field definitions with stored templates, and lacks clarity about the response schema. Improved summary to emphasize the 'advanced' aspect (pre-configured templates). Enhanced description to clearly distinguish this from the basic form recognition operation, explain the template configuration requirement, specify the response schema, and correct terminology.

data.current_summary: Recognize a photo of a form, extract key fields using stored templates
data.current_description: Analyzes a photograph of a form as input, and outputs key business fields and information.  Customzie data to be extracted by defining fields for the form.  Uses template definitions stored in Cloudmersive Configuration; to configure stored templates in a configuration bucket, log into Cloudmersive Management Portal and navigate to Settings > API Configuration > Create Bucket.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.summary_suggestion: Extract form fields from a photo using pre-configured template definitions
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a photograph of a form and extracts key fields and business information using pre-configured template definitions stored in Cloudmersive Configuration. This operation uses stored templates rather than inline field definitions, allowing reuse of form configurations. Template definitions must be configured in advance via the Cloudmersive Management Portal (Settings > API Configuration > Create Bucket). Returns a FormRecognitionResult object containing the extracted field values and confidence ratings. Requires authentication via API key. Note: Free tier API keys require a credit card on file for security purposes to use this operation.
data.reasoning: Original description has typo ('Customzie'), conflates inline field definitions with stored templates, and lacks clarity about the response schema. Improved summary to emphasize the 'advanced' aspect (pre-configured templates). Enhanced description to clearly distinguish this from the basic form recognition operation, explain the template configuration requirement, specify the response schema, and correct terminology.

message: Operation 'ImageOcr_PhotoRecognizeReceipt' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. The current description lacks explicit mention of the response schema (ReceiptRecognitionResult) and authentication requirements. Added specific response schema type and clarified authentication requirement to improve AI agent understanding of what data will be returned and how to use the operation.

data.current_summary: Recognize a photo of a receipt, extract key business information
data.current_description: Analyzes a photograph of a receipt as input, and outputs key business information such as the name of the business, the address of the business, the phone number of the business, the total of the receipt, the date of the receipt, and more.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a photograph of a receipt and extracts key business and transaction information including business name, address, phone number, receipt total, date, line items, and other details. Returns a ReceiptRecognitionResult object containing the extracted fields and confidence ratings. Requires authentication via API key. Note: Free tier API keys require a credit card on file for security purposes to use this operation.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks explicit mention of the response schema (ReceiptRecognitionResult) and authentication requirements. Added specific response schema type and clarified authentication requirement to improve AI agent understanding of what data will be returned and how to use the operation.

message: Operation 'ImageOcr_PhotoWordsWithLocation' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. The current description has a typo ('metdata' should be 'metadata') and lacks explicit mention of the response schema type. Added specific response schema (PhotoToWordsWithLocationResult) and clarified what location information includes (bounding box coordinates). This helps AI agents understand the exact output format and when to use this operation versus alternatives.

data.current_summary: Convert a photo of a document or receipt into words with location
data.current_description: Converts a photo of a document or receipt in common formats such as JPEG, PNG into words/text with location information and other metdata via Optical Character Recognition.  This API is intended to be run on photographs of documents.  If you want to OCR scanned documents (e.g. taken with a scanner), be sure to use the image/toText API instead, as it is designed for that use case.  Note: for free tier API keys, it is required to add a credit card to your account for security reasons, to use the free tier key with this API.
data.description_suggestion: Converts a photo of a document or receipt in common formats (JPEG, PNG) into words/text with location information and metadata via Optical Character Recognition. Returns a PhotoToWordsWithLocationResult object containing recognized words, their bounding box coordinates, and confidence ratings. This operation is optimized for photographs of documents taken with cameras or smartphones. For scanned documents, use the image/toText API instead. Requires authentication via API key. Note: Free tier API keys require a credit card on file for security purposes to use this operation.
data.reasoning: The current description has a typo ('metdata' should be 'metadata') and lacks explicit mention of the response schema type. Added specific response schema (PhotoToWordsWithLocationResult) and clarified what location information includes (bounding box coordinates). This helps AI agents understand the exact output format and when to use this operation versus alternatives.

message: Operation 'Preprocessing_Binarize' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description is too brief and lacks context about why binarization is useful, what inputs are accepted, and what output is returned. Improved summary to be more specific about the algorithm type. Enhanced description to explain the purpose of binarization in the OCR workflow, clarify input/output formats, and help AI agents understand when to use this preprocessing step before other OCR operations.

data.current_summary: Convert an image of text into a binarized (light and dark) view
data.current_description: Perform an adaptive binarization algorithm on the input image to prepare it for further OCR operations.
data.summary_suggestion: Apply adaptive binarization to prepare images for OCR
data.description_suggestion: Applies an adaptive binarization algorithm to convert an input image into a binary (black and white) representation, optimizing it for subsequent OCR operations. This preprocessing step enhances text contrast and reduces noise, improving OCR accuracy on low-quality or poorly lit document images. Accepts image input in common formats (JPEG, PNG). Returns the binarized image in the same format as the input. Requires authentication via API key.
data.reasoning: Original description is too brief and lacks context about why binarization is useful, what inputs are accepted, and what output is returned. Improved summary to be more specific about the algorithm type. Enhanced description to explain the purpose of binarization in the OCR workflow, clarify input/output formats, and help AI agents understand when to use this preprocessing step before other OCR operations.
